mxCell.value: * passing_score: PositiveIntegerField - Minimum percentage required to pass
explanation: TextField - Explanation for why this answer is correct/incorrect

mxCell.help_text: UUID to track violations submitted together
If the violator is a registered user, link violation to their account
Type of violation or comma-separated list of violations
Whether the violation occurred in a Traffic Discipline Zone, which doubles the fine
Original violation types before adjudication (stored as JSON)
Classification of violation (Regular for direct tickets, NCAP for uploaded violations)
Whether this violation type is for NCAP (Non-Contact Apprehension Program)
